DescriptionData.Title: Pride Socks - Childrens Rainbow Split Striped Athletic Socks
DescriptionData.Description: 10" tube socks are sized for babies and small kids up to 5 years of age. The white tube socks are high quality and durable and have two thick bands of rainbow colored stripes on each sock. One stripe of red, orange, yellow and another of green, blue and purple at the top of each sock. 75% Ring Spun Cotton, 14% Nylon, 7% Acrylic, 4% Spandex. Made in the USA.
DescriptionData.BulletPoint: 10" socks are recommended for children 5 and under. 14" socks are recommended for kids between the ages of 5 and 10
Perfect for use as leg warmers as well as athletic socks
White tube socks with a thick stripe of red, orange, yellow and another of green, blue and purple at the top of each sock
75% Ring Spun Cotton, 14% Nylon, 7% Acrylic, 4% Spandex Made in the USA
